about_the_game:
THE RIDE OF YOUR LIFE


  • Ride 22 motorcycles with the official BMW, Honda, Kawasaki, KTM, Suzuki and Yamaha licences.
  • From 125 to 2000cc, find all of the biggest makes, faithfully reproduced with 3 unique ways to play: Superbike, Roadster and Custom.
  • Hit the road in Tournament mode and take on over 40 challenges of skill on 20 different circuits.
  • Customize your riders and challenge rival clubs in solo mode or in wild online games with up to 4 players.
detailed_description:
THE RIDE OF YOUR LIFE


  • Ride 22 motorcycles with the official BMW, Honda, Kawasaki, KTM, Suzuki and Yamaha licences.
  • From 125 to 2000cc, find all of the biggest makes, faithfully reproduced with 3 unique ways to play: Superbike, Roadster and Custom.
  • Hit the road in Tournament mode and take on over 40 challenges of skill on 20 different circuits.
  • Customize your riders and challenge rival clubs in solo mode or in wild online games with up to 4 players.

name: Motorcycle Club Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® Vista updated with the latest Service Pack
  • Processor: Intel® Core™2 Quad Q6600 or AMD Phenom II X4™ 805
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 8800 series or ATI™ Radeon™ 4870
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Ride 22 motorcycles with the official BMW, Honda, Kawasaki, KTM, Suzuki and Yamaha licences. Play solo or online at the handlebars of Superbike, Roadster and Custom models, and create, customize and develop your club.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
